response.overview: arenthood is a crafty beast. The second you master something it changes the game, so you're rubbish at it again. Wading through a million nappies, Peppa Pig episodes and a hell of hair loss, Scouser Sam Avery shares the lows, highs and hilarious in-betweens of his first-time parenthood. Prepare to test your pelvic floor with laughter in this well crafted hour of pure observational entertainment.
response.title: Sam Avery: The Learner Parent
